SEARCH
Module HackathonManagementSystem
Package system

Class HackathonSystem

java.lang.Object
system.HackathonSystem
public class HackathonSystem extends Object
The HackathonSystem class is the central controller for managing all operations in the National-Level Hackathon System.

Responsibilities:

  • Register teams
  • Add members to teams
  • Score teams
  • Generate reports
  • Save and load team data from file
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wong Wai Soon
